page.title: 11North Yorkshire village life
page.content: A telephone & car are almost essential & shopping must be well planned. Whilst supporting the village shop as well as growing their own produce many housewives make a weekly trip to the local market towns for the bulk of their shopping. Although most houses have modern equipment,central heating, washing machines,freezers & perhaps microwave ovens,one or two residents still use the old side oven & racken with pots hanging over the fire. Electricity is very important as none of the villages has a town gas supply. However,wood is plentiful,cheap & as this is not a smokeless zone the open fire,often with a back boiler to heat water,is still extensively used.
